nodes.text: Wendin was a Human male who served in the Republic Military during the Great Galactic War and the subsequent Cold War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Cold War, he commanded the Republic forces on Coruscant.
Stationed on Coruscant during the Cold War with the Sith Empire, General Wendin was in charge of the Republic forces of the planet.

During the year 3643 BBY, Wendin sent Republic forces to recover an astrogation computer from the ruins of the Jedi Temple. They encountered and an Imperial presence in The Works and the ruins, which was also trying to find the computer. The computer contained secret hyperspace routes discovered by Jedi hundreds of years ago, and it would give either side a powerful advantage in the Cold War.
An individual acting on behalf of the Republic recovered the device for the Republic, and gave it to General Wendin at his command center in the Senate Tower.

General Wendin was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. he appears in the Coruscant Heroic Mission "Enemies of the Republic", where he accepts the astrogation computer that the players retrieved from the Temple.
